FuncDef: The undo ip route-static all command deletes all the configured IPv4 unicast static route. The undo ip route-static all command deletes all the configured IPv4 unicast static route. By default, no IPv4 unicast static routes are configured in the system.
CLIs: undo ip route-static track bfd-session all

ParaDef.Info:
Associates a static BFD session with the static route to fast detect faults.
-
